title: Family members play important role in managing chronic illness

title_detail.value: Family members play important role in managing chronic illness

summary: Family members often play an important role in managing chronic illnesses, and a family approach may produce more effective, long-term benefits for the patient, according to a researcher.

summary_detail.value: Family members often play an important role in managing chronic illnesses, and a family approach may produce more effective, long-term benefits for the patient, according to a researcher.
